name: Virtual Girl (TwoDev-Sensei)
description:
Year 2017, Internet has been invaded by some strange virus, making it unusable all over the world...  This begun the adventure of the Virtual Girl: Erika. 

Virtual Girl is a Platform game, which control Erika, the Virtual Girl who find a request of help to restore Internet. This game started its development  11 days ago,  so some contents were cutted for time issues. We hope you enjoy this game, made in Italy.
